job_description:
Responsibilities: Babok Courier Ltd is hiring. Hubs (HUB & Branch): Uttara HUB: Airport, Bimanbandar, Dakshinkhan, Khilkhet, Turag, Uttara, Uttara Purba, Uttara Pashchim, Uttarkhan Matijhil HUB: Banshbari, Chakbazar, Demra, Gandaria, Jatrabari, Kadamtali, Kotwali, Matijhil, Paltan, Sayedabad, Shamipur, Sutrapur, Wari Mirpur HUB: Cantonment, Darus Salam, Kafrul, Mirpur Model, Pallabi, Rupnagar, Shah Ali, Sher-e-Bangla Nagar, Vashantek Basabo HUB: Khilgaon, Mugda, Paltan, Ramna, Rampura, Sabujbag, Shahbag, Shahjahanpur, Shantinagar Mohakhali HUB: Badda, Banani, Gulshan 1, Tejgaon, Tejgaon Industrial Area Mohammadpur HUB: Adabor, Dhanmondi, Hazaribagh, Kalabagan, Mohammadpur, Panthapath, Tejgaon, Tejgaon Industrial Area Bokshi Bazar HUB: Azimpur, Banshbari, Chakbazar, Gulistan, Kamrangirchar, Lalbagh, New Market, Paltan, Ramna, Shahbag Bashundhara HUB: Badda, Banani, Bashundhara, Gulshan 2, Shahjadpur, Vatara Qualifications: Must have own bicycle/motorcycle. Ability to read Bangla and English. Must have a smartphone. Benefits: Competitive salary. Delivery commission [Fixed + Variable]. Performance bonus. Attendance bonus. Walk-in Interview: ЁЯУН 10 AM - 4 PM. ЁЯУН Address: Beside Xinxian Restaurant, House: 03, Road: 08, Block: C, Section: 06, Mirpur, Dhaka [Map Link: https://maps.app.goo.gl/Xgxmq9NWihBqknmM6 ] Contact: +8801805019347 [WhatsApp Only] ЁЯУЮ Contact now! ЁЯСЙ Babok Courier Ltd. - Your new destination for courier services!

Requirements: Must have own bicycle / motorcycle. Should be able to read Bangla and English. Must have a smartphone. Educational qualifications are not required for experienced individuals. Freshers can also apply.

company_name: Lion Industrious Security Service Ltd. Dhaka
company_address: Kajla Bridge, Demra Road, Jatrabari, Jatrabari, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: Registered and licensed institutions will hire a significant number of security guards for the protection and surveillance of domestic and foreign Chinese and Indian projects, mills, factories, warehouses, houses, showrooms, banks, and ATM booths.

Requirements: No need for experience or guarantee here. Other facilities: Free accommodation. Bonus salary given by the 10th of each month. Adequate overtime benefits available. Free medical treatment, bonus for 2 festivals per year. Attendance bonus equivalent to 1 day's attendance. Salary will increase in the first 6 months and annually thereafter. Those who are willing to work can contact the office directly or via WhatsApp. Contact: 01911131063 Yatrabari, Kajla Bridge.

Responsibilities: Responsibilities Section:
Motivate and guide sales staff to improve productivity
- Ensure product availability and effective stock rotation
- Support promotions, campaigns, and discount activities
- Ensure high customer service standards across the store
- Handle customer complaints and escalations efficiently
- Monitor customer feedback and implement improvements
- Supervise sales associates, cashiers, and floor staff
- Prepare duty rosters and manage attendance, leave, and punctuality
- Train staff on product knowledge, SOPs, and customer handling
- Monitor staff grooming, behavior, and discipline
- Coordinate with the inventory/store room team for stock movement
- Reduce pilferage, damages, and stock discrepancies
- Assist in stock counts and internal audits
- Prepare daily/weekly sales and operational reports
- Ensure compliance with SOPs, safety rules, and the Bangladesh Labor Law
- Support the Store Manager during inspections and audits

Responsibilities: Developing various design concepts and sharing them with clients/teams Designing according to client's instructions Creating all types of print designs including logos, banners, posters, brochures, and flyers Must know how to design book covers and have an idea about four-color printing Must be proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator Creating daily and campaign-based creative designs for social media Creating designs according to brand guidelines Editing, retouching, and creating makeup designs for images as needed Providing creative ideas in coordination with the marketing team Delivering creative designs within the specified timeframe

Responsibilities: In the areas of Panthapath, Rampura, Mohammadpur, Sher-e-Bangla Nagar, and Uttarkhan, there are vacancies.

Salary:
Cyclist: 9,834 - 13,434 BDT. (Having a bicycle is necessary)
- Shifts from 7 AM, 9 AM, and 10:45 AM.
- 12-hour duty.
- One day off every 3 consecutive days, 8 days off per month.
- Monthly mobile bill provided.
- Delivery bonus:
  - 10 BDT bonus for each delivery from 18 to 24.
  - 15 BDT bonus for all deliveries after 24.
Incentive scheme available.
Other benefits:
- Salary increment after six months.
- Festival allowance given twice a year.
- 14 days sick leave per year after six months.
- 11 days festival leave per year after six months.
- 12 days earned leave per year after six months.
- 10 days casual leave per year after six months.

To join, contact today:
01401153402

Requirements: Terms and Conditions:
Cyclist must have a bicycle in the post.
Must be 18 years old.

job_description:
Responsibilities: In the areas of Jatrabari, Lalbag, Fakirbadi, Dhalibadi (Bhatera), and Uttara, there are vacancies. Salary: Cyclist: 9,834 - 13,434 taka. (Having a bicycle is necessary) ┬╖ Shifts from 7 am, 9 am, and 10:45 am. 12 hours duty. ┬╖ One day off after every 3 days, 8 days off per month. Monthly mobile bill provided. -> Delivery bonus: ┬╖ 10 taka bonus for each delivery from 18 to 24, ┬╖ 15 taka bonus for all deliveries after 24. Incentive system is available. -> Other facilities: ┬╖ Salary increment after six months. ┬╖ Festival allowance given twice a year. ┬╖ 14 days sick leave per year after six months. ┬╖ 11 days festival leave per year after six months. ┬╖ 12 days earned leave per year after six months. ┬╖ 10 days casual leave per year after six months. Contact today to join: 01401153402

Requirements: Terms and Conditions:
Cyclist must have a bicycle in the post.
Must be 18 years old.

job_description:
Responsibilities: - Strong knowledge of Meta (Facebook, Instagram) advertising rules, policies, and regulations.
- Strong proficiency in maintaining and managing Google Worksheets (data tracking, reporting, analysis).
- Ability to monitor ad performance and optimize campaigns to improve clicks, reach, engagement, and conversions.
- Hands-on experience with tools such as Meta Business Suite, Google Analytics, Hootsuite, or similar platforms.
- Capability to develop and implement social media strategies aligned with overall marketing and business objectives.
- Willingness and ability to continuously learn new digital tools, algorithms, and advertising methods.
- Experience in managing paid advertising campaigns across platforms such as Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, TikTok Ads, and Google Ads.
- Skill in creating engaging social media posts and product highlights to enhance brand visibility.
- Ability to support and coordinate digital advertising campaigns across Google, Facebook, and Instagram platforms.
- Monitor comments, messages, reviews, and posts across all assigned social media channels.
- Review and approve/reject user-generated content to ensure it meets community standards.
- Respond to inquiries, feedback, and complaints in a timely and professional manner.
- Escalate sensitive or complex issues to the appropriate internal teams (e.g., customer support, PR).
- Remove or report harmful, offensive, spam, or inappropriate content.
- Enforce community guidelines consistently and fairly.
- Track and report recurring issues, user sentiment, and community trends.
- Collaborate with content, marketing, and customer service teams to align tone, messaging, and engagement strategies.

Must have the desire to work and learn under immense pressure. Must have the mentality to provide customers with round-the-clock service. Ensuring service quality

Requirements: Minimum S.S.C. Work experience in ISP Basic networking knowledge Must be responsible, honest, and hardworking

Responsibilities: The Digital Sales team relies heavily on field-level freelancers for lead generation. To ensure the Acquisition team has a steady and sufficient lead pipeline for both Shops and Restaurants, we need your support for freelancer hiring for lead generation.

What are our current offerings for the freelancers?

To encourage active participation, we are providing rewards for each qualified lead:
- BDT 75 per qualified Restaurant lead
- BDT 60 per qualified Shop lead
- Payment disbursement: Processed by HR and released by the end of the next month

Qualifying Criteria:
- Leads must be new and not available in Salesforce.
- SKU Limit: 11 items
- All leads must be submitted through the Google Form.
- Leads must fall within existing delivery zones. Freelancers can verify coverage by checking the Bangladesh Delivery Map.

Support & Training:
- The Digital Sales team is willing to conduct short training sessions for freelancers on how to identify potential leads and how to submit them properly.
